taskDescription:
Evaluate <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo>!</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n!</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>!</mo>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">(n - 1)!</annotation></semantics></math> for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n = 6</annotation></semantics></math>.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>n</mi>
  <mo>!</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mo>!</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>2</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>720</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">n! = 6! = 6 \cdot 5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3 \cdot 2 \cdot 1 = 720</annotation></semantics></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow>
    <mo>(</mo>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi>n</mi>
      <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
      <mn>1</mn>
    </mrow>
    <mo>)</mo>
  </mrow>
  <mo>!</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
  <mn>6</mn>
  <mo>−<!-- − --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
  <mo>!</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mo>!</mo>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>5</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>3</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>2</mn>
  <mo>⋅<!-- ⋅ --></mo>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>120</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\left( {n - 1} \right)! = (6 - 1)! = 5! = 5 \cdot 4 \cdot 3 \cdot 2 \cdot 1 = 120</annotation></semantics></math>
